Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment:
After 28 years my older sister's friend being married, (they got married when she was only 18), having children, getting out poverty together, worked so hard inside the house and outside the house, sometimes she has to work double shift, so they can cover everything for the kids and other expenses. Then her husband walked away and got himself another wife when he became financially free. 
It's very hard to find somebody you trust now days.
She was devastated and fell into deep depression. Now white people give her antidepressant medication. Her entire life was destroyed by the same man she thought who loved her. But then, he just walked away as if she never existed. There is no pill can fix that much pain and abandonment.

I feel sorry for her and her kind of women who are attached to the man and never leave anything for themselves for the rainy days.
Prepare yourself for anything life throws at you, men will just leave a second later as if nothing happened..

Years and years passed and she lost her faith, she was broke, she couldn't take anymore, empty promises, silent treatment, sleeping on the couch, no sex, having her family thinking they can take over her life and what it's hers to decide. And then, a woman that didn't do anything good for this whole years and didn't spent any money at all with him, only brought him to cheat, this time again, comes in just like she is a hero and giving him the dream, out of nowhere from this many years, when the one that worked hard for his dreams, was Melinda. It's sad she waited so long, to the point she couldn't take anymore, but she deserved all this more than the other woman, the woman only seemed like she was trying to steal everything like "you go and deal with that guy and pay him everything", she got the best side of him, while Melinda got the worse side, and not even that other woman probably would have patience and time as Melinda had. I mean, just look around and where was she? Not caring about him. Because she didn't devoted her life to him, she didn't even want to have anything with him after knowing he had a girlfriend. But he also didn't said to Melinda only sorry and left her. He kept pushing and pushing, saying he loves her and that's what make her go crazy. The time he pushes her and in the end, she has nothing left.

Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment:
Song by Labrinth- Jealous
1. A good man's dream was fulfilled though it was believable he wouldn't make it.
2. A good woman never dreamed of him but dreamed of his promises and that became her dreams. 
3. Though he righted the wrong. He didn't give her time to heal bf moving on. She had baggage and she lost her dream, she also was sick. I cried when she died. Though I wasn't that crazy I had my moments. I let go of my ex due to the spirit helping me. But, I've never forgiven him of killing my dreams! I wanted to. This is why I relate to her ğŸ˜œ.  I'd realized I don't trust dreams. I hate the feeling of you are a reject. I realized it was my fault not his for him to have so much power over me and my dreams. I'd realized it's not worth being obsessed with your dream as both of the characters were. More in love with their dreams then each other. I cried bc I'm still trying to win back a dream I lost to him years ago. I put my hope in heaven, but I have my doubts. So I pretend. I've decided to enjoy the journey and not the destination. Not stress about dreams, enjoy persuing it regardless of the double edged reward. I pretend I will arrive and never truly believe till I'm there. I hope it does last forever as all dreams seem to die. Heaven. This movie might had sucked for y'all but I get it. Both characters messed up at some point and both grew hard hearts.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment:
SPOILER alert!

I would have dubbed him after the cheating period but the way I saw it is that I really understood her mental breakdown I really sympathize with her all the sacrifices she did for him, and letâ€™s not pretend he didnâ€™t ask for them like most men when they throw it in your face â€œ I didnâ€™t ask you to â€œ because this man did, many times and she did it all over because she loved him it was second nature to her as breathing.  

All she ever wanted was for him to get a job and help around because she was so tired after a while the whole battery thing must have taken a toll on her, but even then she never doubted his intelligence she was there from the start. When he got upset that Prescott security asked him to stay away she was clearly distressed for him and felt sad for him, she was there from the start  helping him with supplies and even a name for it. She just wanted to have him help around but what made her stick through and not lose hope  was the promises of her boat her ring and everything he promised. Maybe she was delusional that way just like a child want their favorite toy his promises and words was that little glimpse of hope for her. 

Now to see the wallet of a bitch you once saw with your own eyes,  your husband fuck with and cheat with ALONE Is enough to make someone lose it specially when you are already going through an emotional breakdown, and then on top of that Diana was helping Robert and that must have hurt too because Melinda is the one who been helping him the MOST! Diana just happened to work in the same building so her helping him wasnâ€™t even that hard, if Melinda has the same contacts trust she would have helped him even more! And I feel like Diana she got all the credit but in my opinion Melinda did the most.

And yes she divorced him she was under the influence of her sisters being fed up losing the house but come on how many times do people say something and regret it?? Thatâ€™s normal. You canâ€™t think straight while being distressed. But he didnâ€™t even fight for her!!!he fought more for his battery than he ever fought for his wife. And the only time he showed remorse was on the divorce day but come on thatâ€™s too late she even said herself he never checked up on her ask her how sheâ€™s doing nothing. 

So when she understood he made it she was proud trust me she was in her maniac episode it was too much for her reacting normally cause she was losing it already there and had lost it, but she was truly happy for him. People breakup all the time and get back together but they only broke up once  and when she misses him and wants him back (itâ€™s not for the success) she finds out that with the WOMAN he cheated with the visual way, already engaged giving her all the things he promised her sheâ€™s pregnant like that hurts and I understand the pain but Melinda was wrong for investing in Robert he was chasing his dream all along she lost her own identity in him after the cheating she should have left his sorry ass and if not after the ten million dollars and house that yeah was generous she should have invested her money in something and moved on as painful as it was but she didnâ€™t she was clearly sick in a way she sentenced herself to her own misery.

By the way from a womanâ€™s perspective once you given someone your time your youth your all no amount of money nothings can fix that no money no nothing but the love of the man or self love.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment: Yeah, I see the comments about how Tyler Perry does black women a disservice by making these movies about "The Angry Black Women"...yada..yada.  As a creator, writer, director, producer, he is a visionary. His directive is to make movies that will draw big audiences, keep people talking, be entertaining, show different sides of human nature, bring realness (with the exception of some of Madea's over the top antics) to characters and earn a tremendous living. The EXACT thing other movie directors, writers, producers, and creators does.  The phrase: "Hell Hath No Fury Like A Woman Scorned" was not coined by us nor is it particularly regarding us.  Of course, some people will love his movies, while others will hate them. Just like any other movie creator.  All in all, Tyler Perry will keep on keeping on and still maintain his fan base.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment: I don't understand why people are arguing over who was right and who was wrong because Tyler Perry created full, rounded characters who were like real people with both good and bad sides at one point or another :) sort of like real life! We aren't just good or bad, we allow emotions, situations and other people get the best of us sometimes and other times we rise above it. This movie was brilliant because he portrayed everyone in such a human way. Mel was extremely loyal and supportive but at the same time, weak and a pushover. Robert was sly and extremely self-absorbed but also generous and thoughtful at times. Her sisters were very protective and their husbands very helpful but they were also people with poor boundaries and got involved way too much to the detriment of their sister. This is how real life is! People aren't necessarily good or bad, we are just victims to circumstances and our emotions. How tragic, beautiful and freeing!

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment: Instead of 10M she should of received half of the 150M. She deserved it, all her young life, money, hard work, working, supporting him, believing in him, going against her family.  Yes she broke after all those years, it had to happen at some point, no woman is that strong to endure all his selfishness,. But she deserved HALF of his invention proceeds, it was hers too, had there been no her, (her money), there would of been no 150M.  He was selfish to think he did it without her. And then insult her with petty cash,. The other woman saw an opportunity, and like many took the opportunity.  My girlfriend and I watched it together at a conference in a hotel room just chilling.  She was screaming, mad, angry, even got mad at me for my comments, but I could see a lot in this movie going several different ways. But It makes us think into our own marriages , relationships, how far do we go, where do we draw the line. .  I would watch again just to remind myself of many life issues.  Good cast and acting, best of tylers work,  he out did his self , obviously some one he knew experienced some of this and then he embellished  , I am guessing where most of his motivation comes from.  Thanks Tyler for a good movie.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment:
Spoiler.
My opinion on this movie. I feel both sides are in the wrong. Melinda  accepted to be his girlfriend since colleges days then accepted to take him back even after he cheated with the other girl. With that came the shatter of of her ovaries meaning no babies for the future due to her rage of running her car into his RV home he was caught in the act in.  Then comes the spending of the 350,000 all mostly on him because she wanted to help him and see him succeed. Robert was very invested in bringing his battery project to life and sometimes your dreams will take years to fulfill as to why it took him 18 years+ to finally get into business with the company. During all these years his wife is the one taking care of the bills and necessities of the home  which he should have also contributed someway despite his criminal record. I'm sure he could have got a job that pays something but  he was too obsessed with his project, even though he loved her. Now with the reunion of this other girl who happens to leave his wallet in his work truck that is discovered by with co working in-laws it puts him in deeper trouble. Melinda will now trust an affair has been going on all these years with THE SAME GIRL. Even with Robert getting the career at the same place this same girl works and giving Melinda  that 10 million dollars and paying her mothers mortgage after their divorce that SHE granted- it isn't enough for Melinda who has invested in this relationship for life. Now with this alleged pregnancy on Robert new wife who is the same girl he cheated with years ago- it drives a barren Melinda over the edge. Everything really comes down to that Robert only used her for two decades while seeing this other woman and finally became successful WITH THIS OTHER WOMAN NOT MELINDA AS HE PROMISED HER OF THEIR RICHES TOGETHER. This can surely drive someone to madness if they cannot control their impulses.  
This movie is a lesson on patience and trust and how the lack of those can surely end people up in biggest regrets or in worst cases death. 
10/10 for me. Tyler Perry's best work yet.

"if he's not getting it from me, he's getting it from someone else"
Not true. I've been in that situation in which I lost the urge to have sex with my partner. We sleep in the same bed as sometimes we start something which ends just seconds into it. I just grew to dislike her. I waited for distance to separate us. I wasn't cheating but boy I wanted out of the relationship. Sometimes I want to cry about life. How I ended up with someone so careless about anything, herself, and her hygiene. She wasn't cheating and was as honest as anyone can be. But living together for a year exposed me to other side of her I didn't intend to make permanent. 
Life can be strange sometimes. You like someone today and tomorrow you wonder how it happened. Now I am free and that made me really careful about girls I talk to. I find it hard to date now. Being single can be difficult but I discovered if I channel that passion to find love into something else it will turn out great. But the heart that survives on the hope of love, has no need for other nourishments.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment: I thoroughly enjoyed Acrimony. It reminds me of some of his roots in thrillers back in the day, specifically "The Family that Preys", which incidentally also is a sexual cheating thriller, and also co-stars Ms. Henson. I did prefer The Family that Preys. The action picks up towards the ending, but there is a good buildup of suspense and laughter throughout the film which Tyler is graciously known for doing. He blends thriller, drama, and comedy quite well. The comment about Mel's new boo penis size too small for his tall height is hilarious! And the scene when Mel walks in and sees his new boo and that he's moved on is a great scene and you know it's on from there on. 6.3/10 C.

Comment: Do not listen to critics who have trashed this movie. It is a good movie that kept my attention all the way through. I think America is still not used to seeing black people in dramatic roles, well to do families, business owners, intellectuals, all in this movie. Nobody said Glenn Close was unrealistic or over the top  when she boiled a familys rabbit in fatal attraction,  but when taraji spazzes out its not right. Anyway, great movie. Proud mary it is not

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment:
Can we not pull the race card for everything? Fatal Attraction starred a crazy ass white woman , so did Single White Female, Obsessed, Basic Instinct, Poison Ivy. I could literally write a list as long as my arm on White actresses that have played crazy ass bitches in films and that have been treated like shit by their white husbands in these films and are raging mad for revenge. As black ppl we are definitely exploited and stereotyped in many unflattering and unfair ways by society but i don't believe this is one of those situations because i have seen similar scenarios to this before acted out and portrayed by white actors in films MANY A TIME. 
Sometimes just take things for what they are instead of trying to create something to moan about. People are in the comment section saying white ppl gonna think black women are angry, crazy and that black men are no good *confused face*  why do you care so much about what they think? do you feel you need their validation? are they more superior? Thoughts are just that THOUGHTS. Anybody with common sense knows that  Hell hath no fury like ANY woman scorned. Hurt, pain and madness is a universal thing and is not limited to black females. Lets not turn this into anything other than an amazing film starring an inspiration Miss Taraji P Henson.

Comment:
Memo to ALL Liberal-minded feminist Black  women: 

This movie is an intense character study of the liberal-minded black woman on film. It shows how a marriage built on lust and not Almighty GOD at the core can turn a fairytale marriage into fatal attraction lightning quick. It's NO surprise that Taraji P. Henson's been specifically cast in this film Acrimony and tv show Empire, to demonstrate the mindset of a mentally and emotionally unstable liberal woman who feels that she's equal to a man. And how she will go to extreme lengths to prove that she's more cutthroat. This film clip trailer is ABSOLUTE confirmation that if we call out every MAN to be accountable for their actions, ALL WOMEN NEED to be held accountable as well. 

This film is confirmation that just like Taraji P. Henson's character, all of liberal-minded black women have ZERO ACCOUNTABILITY for your words and actions. And especially when they come from deep-rooted ANGER, the social environment and parental upbringing that you grew up with. I hope this sheds light on the journey that turned Taraji P. Henson's character from peaceful to absolutely ruthless. As a hardworking brotha, I'm not perfect. No one in this world ğŸŒ is and that's a fact. But I'm grateful 2 Almighty GOD for life and for helping me be accountable for my words and actions. In my opinion, Taraji P. Henson's character in Acrimony should be a cautionary tale to MEN everywhere that's looking for a long-term partner. WOMEN, this also a cautionary tale for YOU because there's a great deal of masculine energy covering up the feminine energy portrayed by Taraji P. Henson in this film clip. When children are involved, that's where confusion starts to settle in. We need to understand our culture and where we're from in terms of manners, tact, WISDOM and RESPECT in the home and our community as  whole. WOMEN aren't supposed to be operating under masculine energy at all. Women are supposed to be submissive to their husbands and husbands are to be submissive to their wives in the covenant of marriage. 

This film touches on 6 subjects: Marriage, Anger, Infidelity, Jealousy, Unforgiveness and Revenge.

Title: Tyler Perryâ€™s Acrimony (2018 Movie) Official Trailer â€“ Taraji P. Henson
Comment: I'll pass on this movie. I'm just sick of seeing stereotypical movies, that show Black men and women in a negative space. Tyler Perry and others alike need a new storyline, this one is old and played out. I need to see more positive roles starring Black people. It's other movie genres, that can be shown with Black people. We are much better than always being at each other's throats. It's time for a change. Instead of always showing us as violent, hurting, poor, using drugs, uneducated, dysfunctional, and etc., we can see a lot of empowering roles, more loving and embracing movies, love comedies, happy families, powerful historical movies, science type of movies, futuristic movies, positive and etc. We are not a one trick pony type of people. Our people are so comfortable and conditioned, to see these types of movies and don't understand how these negative imageries affect us. I believe if we have more positive images of us in film, business, T.V., and other things we will be able to fix our communities and all other things. Not saying images are the only thing that can change our plight, but in today's society a lot of people have become influenced more, by what they see on social media, movies, T.V. shows, and images. So it's a big deal to see more positive images and roles of our people. Look at the movie Black Panther, people/children were more excited about seeing that movie than anything else this year. A lot of people expressed how they felt about seeing that movie. So it makes a huge difference to push a better image of us as a whole.

Comment: Disclaimer: The purpose of the movie is not keep a stereotype on black women. As he said in an interview, the purpose of the movie is to show that most people only look at things from one perspective. Until one steps back and realizes that there are other perspectives, he or she will experience hardships, intense pain, and acrimony (which means bitterness). As the story line goes on, the audience will realize that there's more to the story than just Taraji's character's perspective. The movie has a biblical meaning behind it - be quick to listen and slow to speak, and forgive.
